fullText: The musical adaptation of J.P. Miller's teleplay and Blake Edwards's film captures the devastating trajectory of alcoholism with remarkable emotional honesty and musical sophistication.
dtliExcerpt: The musical adaptation of J.P. Miller's teleplay and Blake Edwards's film captures the devastating trajectory of alcoholism with remarkable emotional honesty and musical sophistication.
